system.effect: These Trainers and Pok√©mon can read the Auras of other living beings. Each Aura conveys two pieces of information. First, its hue or color reveals something about the personality of the target. The hue of an Aura may change over time if an individual undergoes significant changes in personality or worldview. Second, Auras also appear brightened or darkened at times. Brightened auras can reflect good moods and intentions, whereas darkened auras can reflect a sour mood or deceptive and negative intentions.
